item.title: Automatically Launch AWS Instances With Dyn
item.description: Dyn can provide a very simple solution for fail over. When you have a network outage in your primary Data Center you want to fail over as soon as possible. I use Dyn DNS “FailOver” feature to determine if a service is completely down on a site. you can use a simple http check and parse the response. Then the script launches X number of instances in AWS as soon as it detects the “Error” status.
